templates.name: Leave Request
templates.description: Standard request for annual, emergency, or special leave

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request annual leave for the period of [START DATE] to [END DATE], for a total of [NUMBER] days of chargeable leave.

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: [State the purpose of leave - e.g., family vacation, wedding, personal matters, etc.]

paragraphs.subject: Leave Balance
paragraphs.text: My current leave balance is [NUMBER] days.  Upon completion of this leave, my balance will be [NUMBER] days.

paragraphs.subject: Contact Information
paragraphs.text: While on leave, I can be reached at [PHONE NUMBER].  My leave address will be [FULL ADDRESS INCLUDING CITY, STATE, ZIP].

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact for this request is the undersigned at [DSN/COMMERCIAL PHONE] or [EMAIL].

templates.name: Special Liberty Request
templates.description: Request for special liberty (72/96 hour)

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request [72/96] hour special liberty for the period of [START DATE/TIME] to [END DATE/TIME].

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: [Provide justification for the special liberty request - e.g., family event, personal matter requiring travel, etc.]

paragraphs.subject: Travel
paragraphs.text: I [will/will not] be traveling outside the local liberty area.  [If traveling: destination is (CITY, STATE), approximately (X) miles from base.]

paragraphs.subject: Contact Information
paragraphs.text: I can be reached at [PHONE NUMBER] during the liberty period.

templates.name: Request Mast
templates.description: Formal request to speak with commanding officer

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I respectfully request mast with the Commanding Officer.

paragraphs.subject: Nature of Request
paragraphs.text: [Clearly state the issue or matter you wish to discuss.  Be specific but professional.  Include relevant dates and circumstances.]

paragraphs.subject: Chain of Command Actions
paragraphs.text: [Describe what actions you have taken to resolve this matter through the chain of command, including dates and outcomes of those discussions.]

paragraphs.subject: Desired Resolution
paragraphs.text: [State what outcome or resolution you are seeking from the Commanding Officer.]

templates.name: Award Recommendation (NAM)
templates.description: Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal recommendation
templates.subj: RECOMMENDATION FOR NAVY AND MARINE CORPS ACHIEVEMENT MEDAL

paragraphs.subject: Recommendation
paragraphs.text: Per references (a) and (b), [RANK FULL NAME] is recommended for the Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal for meritorious [service/achievement] while serving as [BILLET TITLE], [UNIT NAME], from [START DATE] to [END DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Background
paragraphs.text: [Provide context about the Marine's duties and responsibilities during the award period.]

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Describe specific achievements that warrant recognition.  Use quantifiable metrics where possible.  Focus on actions that exceeded normal expectations.  Examples: led X Marines, trained X personnel, saved $X, improved readiness by X%, etc.]

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Explain the positive impact these achievements had on unit readiness, mission accomplishment, or Marine Corps operations.]

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact for this matter is the undersigned at [PHONE/EMAIL].

templates.name: Letter of Appreciation
templates.description: Formal letter of appreciation for outstanding service

paragraphs.text: I would like to express my sincere appreciation for your outstanding performance and dedication to duty while serving as [BILLET] from [START DATE] to [END DATE].
[Describe specific accomplishments, highlighting 2-3 key achievements and their positive impact on the unit or mission.]
Your professionalism, initiative, and commitment to excellence reflect great credit upon yourself and [UNIT NAME].  I wish you continued success and Semper Fidelis.

templates.name: Counseling (Positive)
templates.description: Documented positive counseling for outstanding performance

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: To formally recognize and document your outstanding performance and positive contributions to the unit.

paragraphs.subject: Observation
paragraphs.text: [Describe the specific positive behavior, accomplishment, or performance observed.  Include date(s) and circumstances.]

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Explain the positive impact this had on the unit, mission accomplishment, or fellow Marines.]

paragraphs.subject: Recommendation
paragraphs.text: Continue to maintain this high standard of performance.  Your dedication and professionalism set the example for others to follow.

templates.name: Counseling (Corrective)
templates.description: Documented corrective counseling for deficiencies

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: To formally document a deficiency in your performance/conduct and establish clear expectations for immediate improvement.

paragraphs.subject: Observation
paragraphs.text: [Describe the specific deficiency observed.  Include date, time, location, and circumstances.  Be factual and specific.]

paragraphs.subject: Standard
paragraphs.text: [Cite the applicable standard, order, regulation, or policy that was not met.  Reference specific MCO, unit SOP, or UCMJ article if applicable.]

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Explain how this deficiency negatively affected or could affect unit readiness, good order and discipline, or mission accomplishment.]

paragraphs.subject: Expectation
paragraphs.text: You are expected to correct this deficiency immediately and ensure it does not recur.  Failure to improve may result in adverse administrative or disciplinary action.

paragraphs.subject: Assistance
paragraphs.text: [Identify any assistance, resources, or training available to help the Marine improve.  Include mentor assignment if applicable.]

paragraphs.subject: Acknowledgment
paragraphs.text: Your signature below acknowledges receipt of this counseling.  It does not indicate agreement or disagreement with its contents.

templates.name: Page 11 Entry Request
templates.description: Request for administrative remarks entry in service record

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), request the following administrative remarks entry be made in the official military personnel file of [RANK FULL NAME].

paragraphs.subject: Proposed Entry
paragraphs.text: "[DATE]: [VERBATIM TEXT OF PROPOSED PAGE 11 ENTRY.  Use proper format per IRAM.]"

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Explain why this entry is necessary and appropriate.  Reference supporting documentation if applicable.]

templates.name: Endorsement (Recommend Approval)
templates.description: Endorsement recommending approval of a request

paragraphs.text: [Provide supporting justification for approval.  Include any relevant information not contained in the basic letter that supports the request.]

templates.name: Endorsement (Recommend Disapproval)
templates.description: Endorsement recommending disapproval of a request

paragraphs.text: [Provide specific reasons for recommending disapproval.  Be factual and professional.  Reference applicable policies or regulations if relevant.]

templates.name: Endorsement (For Information)
templates.description: Endorsement forwarding without recommendation

paragraphs.text: [Provide any additional information or context relevant to the basic letter.  State if no additional comments or recommendations are required at this level.]

templates.name: Fitness Report Cover Letter
templates.description: Cover letter for fitness report submission

paragraphs.text: Enclosure (1) is submitted for [RANK FULL NAME] for the reporting period [START DATE] to [END DATE].  This is a [REGULAR/TRANSFER/DETACHMENT/SPECIAL] fitness report.
[If applicable: Provide any amplifying information regarding the report, such as explanation of adverse marks, comments on Marine's potential, or other relevant context.]

templates.name: PFT/CFT Waiver Request
templates.description: Request for waiver of physical fitness test

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request a waiver from the [PFT/CFT] scheduled for [DATE] due to [MEDICAL/ADMINISTRATIVE] reasons.

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Explain the circumstances requiring the waiver.  If medical, reference medical documentation.  If administrative, explain the situation.]

paragraphs.subject: Alternative Date
paragraphs.text: I request to complete the [PFT/CFT] on or about [PROPOSED DATE] when [explain when condition will be resolved or situation permits].

paragraphs.subject: Supporting Documentation
paragraphs.text: Enclosure (1) provides [medical documentation/supporting documentation] for this request.

templates.name: Training Request
templates.description: Request for formal school or training course

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request authorization to attend [COURSE NAME] ([COURSE NUMBER if applicable]) conducted at [LOCATION] from [START DATE] to [END DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Explain how this training supports your current billet, MOS requirements, or career development.  Describe how the unit will benefit from this training.]

paragraphs.subject: Funding
paragraphs.text: [Address funding requirements: TDY costs, course fees, etc.  Identify source of funding if known.]

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: My absence during this training period [will/will not] impact unit operations.  [If applicable: explain how duties will be covered.]

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact for this request is the undersigned at [PHONE/EMAIL].

templates.name: Government Travel Card Request
templates.description: Request for Government Travel Charge Card
templates.subj: REQUEST FOR GOVERNMENT TRAVEL CHARGE CARD

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request issuance of a Government Travel Charge Card (GTCC) for official travel purposes.

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: A GTCC is required to support upcoming [TAD/TDY/PCS] orders to [LOCATION] scheduled for [DATE].  [Or: My duties require frequent official travel that necessitates a GTCC.]

paragraphs.subject: Acknowledgment
paragraphs.text: I acknowledge that I have completed the required GTCC training and understand my responsibilities as a cardholder per reference (a).

templates.name: Report of Findings
templates.description: Formal report documenting investigation findings

paragraphs.subject: Authority
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), a preliminary inquiry was conducted into [SUBJECT MATTER] as directed by [CONVENING AUTHORITY] on [DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Background
paragraphs.text: [Provide background information and circumstances that prompted the inquiry.  Include dates, locations, and personnel involved.]

paragraphs.subject: Methodology
paragraphs.text: [Describe how the inquiry was conducted: witnesses interviewed, documents reviewed, evidence examined, etc.]

paragraphs.subject: Findings of Fact
paragraphs.text: [List specific findings based on evidence gathered.  Use numbered sub-paragraphs for clarity.  Be objective and factual.]

paragraphs.subject: Conclusion
paragraphs.text: [State conclusions drawn from the findings.  Address whether allegations were substantiated or unsubstantiated.]

paragraphs.subject: Recommendation
paragraphs.text: [Provide recommendations for action: further investigation, administrative action, disciplinary action, case closure, or other appropriate disposition.]

templates.name: Request for Orders Modification
templates.description: Request to modify PCS or TAD orders

paragraphs.subject: Request
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), I request modification to my orders [ORDER NUMBER] dated [DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Current Orders
paragraphs.text: I am currently ordered to report to [GAINING UNIT] NLT [REPORT DATE] for duty as [BILLET].

paragraphs.subject: Requested Modification
paragraphs.text: [Clearly state the specific modification requested: change of report date, change of duty station, deletion of dependent travel, etc.]

paragraphs.subject: Justification
paragraphs.text: [Provide detailed justification for the modification request.  Include any extenuating circumstances or hardship factors.]

paragraphs.subject: Impact
paragraphs.text: [Address how this modification will or will not impact the gaining unit or Marine Corps manning requirements.]

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: Point of contact is the undersigned at [PHONE/EMAIL].

templates.name: Checkout/Transfer Letter
templates.description: Letter confirming checkout and transfer requirements

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: This memorandum provides checkout instructions in preparation for your transfer to [GAINING UNIT] per orders dated [DATE].

paragraphs.subject: Checkout Requirements
paragraphs.text: Complete the attached checkout sheet and obtain all required signatures NLT [DATE].  Ensure all gear is turned in to the armory and supply.  Clear all financial obligations with disbursing.

paragraphs.subject: Records
paragraphs.text: Report to Admin to verify your service record book is complete and accurate.  Ensure all awards, training, and qualifications are properly documented.

paragraphs.subject: Final Inspection
paragraphs.text: Report to [LOCATION] on [DATE] at [TIME] for final checkout inspection with the [FIRST SERGEANT/SERGEANT MAJOR].

paragraphs.subject: Point of Contact
paragraphs.text: For questions, contact the Admin Chief at [PHONE/EMAIL].

templates.name: SGLI Beneficiary Update
templates.description: Notification of SGLI beneficiary change
templates.subj: SERVICEMEMBERS' GROUP LIFE INSURANCE (SGLI) BENEFICIARY UPDATE

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: Per reference (a), this letter confirms my election to update my SGLI beneficiary designation.

paragraphs.subject: Coverage
paragraphs.text: I currently maintain SGLI coverage in the amount of $[AMOUNT].  I have elected to [maintain/increase/decrease] my coverage to $[AMOUNT].

paragraphs.subject: Beneficiary Designation
paragraphs.text: Enclosure (1) is my updated SGLV 8286 designating my beneficiaries as indicated therein.

paragraphs.subject: Acknowledgment
paragraphs.text: I understand this designation supersedes all previous beneficiary designations and will remain in effect until modified or revoked by me in writing.

templates.name: Command Interest Letter
templates.description: Letter expressing command interest in a Marine's development

paragraphs.subject: Purpose
paragraphs.text: This letter establishes command interest in [RANK FULL NAME] to ensure proper mentorship and career development.

paragraphs.subject: Background
paragraphs.text: [Explain why command interest is being established: performance concerns, development potential, recent personal difficulties, or other relevant circumstances.]

paragraphs.subject: Expectations
paragraphs.text: [Outline specific expectations for the Marine during the command interest period.  Include performance standards, behavior requirements, or development goals.]

paragraphs.subject: Mentorship
paragraphs.text: [MENTOR'S RANK AND NAME] is assigned as mentor and will provide weekly counseling and guidance.  Mentor will report progress to the First Sergeant monthly.

paragraphs.subject: Duration
paragraphs.text: This command interest will remain in effect for [PERIOD] or until removed by the Commanding Officer, whichever occurs first.
